casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL
v.
BELLEW. 2016-1082 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 8, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

On order to show cause. Timothy Eric Bellew, Attorney Registration No. 0067573, last known business address in Girard, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to surrender certificate of admission and file an affidavit of compliance on or before January 29, 2018.
